answers.answer: Swollen already? Sometimes its normal but other times it could be preeclampsia Might wana tell yur Dr abt that on the next visit just to be safe
Yea I thought it was weird since its still a little early for that,  but I dnt worry much since when it happens it's because I've been on my feet for a while

question: Bearly 28 weeks and already having swollen feet and horrible back pains and lets not mention the sleepless nights!  Lol all for the love of my child I would go throw it all over and over again!  :)
title: The joys and pains of pregnancy!
